title: How to Make a Snickers Martini

steps.headline: Chill the martini glass ahead of time.
steps.description: For a very quick fix, add several ice cubes and sparkling or regular water to it.

steps.headline: Fill a cocktail shaker about halfway with ice cubes.
Measure and pour all ingredients into the shaker.
Shake vigorously for a few seconds.
steps.description: You'll start to notice condensation building up on the sides.

steps.headline: Prepare the glass.
steps.description: Empty out the martini glass and drizzle chocolate syrup on the inside sides.

steps.headline: Strain the drink into the glass.

text: Chill the martini glass ahead of time. For a very quick fix, add several ice cubes and sparkling or regular water to it. Fill a cocktail shaker about halfway with ice cubes.  Measure and pour all ingredients into the shaker.  Shake vigorously for a few seconds. You'll start to notice condensation building up on the sides. Prepare the glass. Empty out the martini glass and drizzle chocolate syrup on the inside sides. Strain the drink into the glass.  Finished.
